author: Joel Balsam
title: Watch A Couple Have Sex WHILE Ordering Pizza At Domino's
text:
Video Appears To Show Couple Having Sex In A Domino's Trending News: Watch A Couple Get It On WHILE Ordering Pizza At Domino's Shares Quick Take 
I was shocked when I saw that couple having sex on a motorcycle , I truly was. But the shock has worn off. We humans, my dear friends, are f*cking bonobos, and this video continues to prove it. 
The Sun reports that a video has been shared on social media, appearing to show a couple having sex in a Domino´s. 
No, not in the bathroom, nor the alleyway like any decent extremely horny couple. Right in the goddamn line! The video comes from security camera footage inside a Domino´s in Scarborough, United Kingdom. 
Now, it´s unclear if the wait for their ‘za prompted them to kill some time, or if they just walked up there and ordered with their pants down, but either way, WTF guys? 
Thankfully, we have an idea whyTF. 
After the video went viral, a woman claiming to be the pants down pizza bandit in the video spoke up to her critics on social media. 
“If your trying to tell me ya av (sic) never got a bit frisky in a random or public place then ya f*cking boring haha,” she eloquently said. “Everyone’s been ringing us thinking we would be mortified we both just laughed worse things happening in the world than him getting blown off in dominos hahaha.” 
Blown off? Has she even watched the video? 
Anyways, the woman continued with a powerful life mantra: 
“Rule number 1 never waste ya boyfriends b***r and always opt for stuffed crust.” 
What's next, a woman giving a blowjob in a courthouse? Dammit . Okay, sex at a funeral in the middle of the crowd. That can’t have been done, can it? Drop This Fact 
Meanwhile in the U.K., people are freezing their genitals to boost their sexual performance. Show comments
